import React,{useState} from 'react' import Logo from '../../images/book1.png' import './Header.css' function Header() { const [activeInput,setActiveInput] = useState('inputSearch') const handleActiveInput = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() activeInput === 'inputSearch' ? setActiveInput('inputSearch active-input-search') : setActiveInput('inputSearch') } const [toggle,setToggle] = useState('toggle-button') const [toggleLinks,setToggleLinks] = useState('active-links') const handleToggle = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() toggle === 'toggle-button' ? setToggle('toggle-button toggle-bars') : setToggle('toggle-button') toggleLinks === 'active-links' ? setToggleLinks('navbar-links active-links') : setToggleLinks('navbar-links') } return (
  • Home
  • Authors
  • About Us
  • Contact Us
  • Register
) } export default Header
